overview: "Howl" is one video in a series with the general title: "'Unwriting' applied to Mu Fei's 'Blood on Wolf Mountain', 1936". This recording is one of a series of improvised riffs, remediating the 1936 film, "Blood on Wolf Mountain". "Howl" is performed using my freely-available software, "Unwriting". (Barbara Lattanzi)
title: Howl
